example.description: Returns all tags for all Auto Scaling groups.
Returns the tags with a Key value matching either 'keyValue' or 'keyValue2'. The filter names you can query against are 'auto-scaling-group', 'key', 'value', and 'propagate-at-launch'.

example.code: PS C:\>$t1 = New-Object Amazon.AutoScaling.Model.Filter PS C:\>$t1.Name = "key" PS C:\>$t1.Values = @("keyValue", "keyValue2") PS C:\>Get-ASTag -Filter @( $t1 )
example.description: Alternate form using New-Object to construct the filter instances to query against. Returns the tags with a Key value matching either 'keyValue' or 'keyValue2'. The filter names you can query against are 'auto-scaling-group', 'key', 'value', and 'propagate-at-launch'.
Returns the tags for all Auto Scaling groups using manual paging. The tags are returned in batches of 10.
